name: EXMO.me new trade screen WIP
description:
New WIP trade screen - enable chat fixed in place and visible all the time.
Based on my older style for EXMO - https://userstyles.org/styles/150485/exmo-shrink-whitespace

Looks best at 90% zoom in the browser (at 1920+ width monitors).
To utilize Google Exo 2 font you need to uncomment one line in the style because @import is not allowed at userstyles.org
additional_info: 25-Mar-2019 - initial version. Main screen moved to the left, chat fixed on the right, chat width 350->400px.
